name: Barking Hawk
description:
Barking Hawk, alternatively called, Two Tonys: A Best Friend Simulator is a short micro game exploring what it means to be famous, and the reality that we will die. It's also a tacit scream of excitement for Sundae Month's upcoming game Pupperazzi. 

The original idea for this mini visual novel was in a Tweet exchange between Kitfox Games, the publisher, and me. This isn't long. But it's free. I hope you enjoy. And if you do. Let me know what you think! 

I may sometime in the future release an expanded version with cut content, and if I do, at that time I may also look into replacing the music and art, but for now I am tired, and believe I will take a nap. I hope you find this game pleasing and are well rested. Thank you again!
